About Me

By day I confabulate wapdoodles and at night I subvorbify langfettled mees.

Background

  • I am a 25th level half-kobold warrior-mage
  • I possess an enchanted kobold dagger called "The Pheasant Plucker"
  • I played a small but crucial role in the overthrow and gory death of the witch-king N'fer Laysaut and the subsequent destruction of his undead hordes
  • I blame my mother

Skills

  • Wapdoodle confabulation
  • Mees subvorbification

Favorite Things

  • Peaty single-malt whiskey
  • Cheesy chips and gravy
  • Gruffalo crumble
